channel.title: OpenFoundry - Recently Added Listings - Application Layer | Software as a Service

item.title: Kurogo
item.description: Kurogo 是一個來自Modo Labs的行動化自由開源中介軟體，於2008年時，由美國麻省理工學院(MIT)數位平台建置團隊所開發出來，目前程式源碼採用MIT License授權釋出，此專案的功能可匯整不同版面的網站資訊，完善其在行動裝置上的呈現方式，並強化與簡化行動裝置使用者與該網站服務之間的互動程序。當前許多歐美重要的大學院校，與全球前五百大企業都不乏此專案平台的使用者。有鑑於其在行動式裝置與網站服務銜接上的優異表現，評估為具有未來需要性的重要專案，值得國內相關團隊持續觀察與研究。
item.author: webmaster

item.title: CloudSafe
item.description:
CloudSafe GmbH focuses on the development of software and the operation of services in the area of cryptography.

Reference: https://secure.cloudsafe.com/
item.author: dio

item.title: LinkedIn
item.description:
LinkedIn is a business-related social networking site. Founded in December 2002 and launched in May 2003,it is mainly used for professional networking.

Reference: https://www.linkedin.com/
item.author: dio

item.title: Tonido
item.description:
Tonido is home server NAS software. Once installed on a computer, Tonido software makes that computer's files available remotely through the browser from the WAN.

Reference: https://www.tonido.com/
item.author: dio

item.title: Spoon
item.description:
Spoon technology helps enterprises centrally manage, update, and deploy applications. Spoon Server lets you host and manage cloud-based apps on your own networks and servers.

Reference: https://www.spoon.net
item.author: dio

item.title: Sugarsync
item.description:
SugarSync is a provider of Personal Cloud services that enable users to access ALL of their data, anytime, anywhere, and from any device.

Reference: https://www.sugarsync.com/
item.author: dio

item.title: Hatsize
item.description:
Hatsize is a website provide fast, easy web-based access to advanced computing environments to support virtual, physical, and heterogeneous demo and training sessions.

Reference: https://www.hatsize.com/

item.title: CloudShare
item.description:
CloudShare is a cloud computing provider which enables users to create, replicate and share fully-functional IT environments in the Cloud.

Reference: https://www.cloudshare.com/

item.title: Skytap
item.description:
Skytap is the only Cloud Automation solution that empowers users with its self-service simplicity while providing the control and visibility that makes the cloud manageable for IT professionals.

Reference: https://www.skytap.com/index.php
